quest.name: How Do You Do, Fellow Dwarves
journal:
Regitt is jumping at shadows both real and imagined.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Search for a suspicious figure near Weathering, and with the chat mode in Say, enter “lali-ho” to announce your presence.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: I trust all is well with you, Forename. Would that I could say the same for myself. My scouts have recently spotted a suspicious figure skulking about, doubtless looking for an opportunity to abscond with our precious metals.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Make no mistake, if that scoundrel dares to step foot in my workshop, I won't hesitate to take my hammer and give whoever─or whatever─it is a walloping they won't soon forget, but I must admit I don't savor the thought of doing so. My talents lie in crafting, not combat.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: You, however, are artisan and warrior both! I would ask you to patrol the area where the suspect was last sighted, and if you spot anyone, greet them with a hearty lali-ho. I pray you're able to resolve this matter with words, but if they should prove hostile, well...I'll pray for your safe return!

dialogue.name: ELF03909
dialogue.text: And just who the hells are you, eh? Quite the unsavory type, and believe me, I would know. Stay well away if you know what's good for you.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the word “lali-ho” to greet the Nightshade elf.

dialogue.name: ELF03909
dialogue.text: You...you're in league with those sodding dwarves! Well, you go back to your masters and tell them one thing: Lakeland belongs to the elves─every ilm of it!

dialogue.name: GUARD03909
dialogue.text: Well, well, I didn't expect to see the bleedin' hero of the realm on today of all days! To what do I owe the honor?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the word “lali-ho” to greet the vigilant guard.

dialogue.name: GUARD03909
dialogue.text: Oh, I know that one! That's what them dwarves over at the Anvil say, innit? A few of them came down this way and hailed me with those selfsame words.

dialogue.name: GUARD03909
dialogue.text:
Lali-ho! Heh heh...
Well, wherever you're headed, stay out of trouble, yeah?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the word “lali-ho” to greet the wayward gremlin.

dialogue.name: GREMLIN03909
dialogue.text: Lali-ho! Lali-ho, lali-ho! Ho ho ho!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The gremlin mimics the greeting repeatedly, looking quite pleased with itself as it scampers away.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text:
Who─ Who's that!?
Oh, it's you, at last! Well, what did you find out about this intruder?

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Phew, you couldn't have come with better news. Truth be told, I practically soiled myself just imagining what I might have to do with this hammer if something surly were to come this way. Out of pity for them, of course, not fear for myself!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Regardless, I'm glad we had you to check up on things for us. Always prepare for the worst, eh? Speaking of which, if any other suspicious fellows wander near the Anvil, I trust I can count on you once more.
